PROLON NUTRITION

Embark on a five day journey with precision nutrition that gives you the benefits of a prolonged fast. Each day unlocks your body's natural ability to reset and rejuvenate from the inside out (cellular rejuvenation, aka autophagy). Benefits compound With each 5 day cycle of ProLon.

Give yourself 15 days a year towards transformative health and longevity.
Order ProLon

settings.title: BENEFITS TO LOVE
settings.details: 5 days towards a healthier you? You got this!

settings.sub_deshead:
Try out Prolon

  • 3 Cycle of ProLon Reset
  • Ships Once

Try out Prolon

  • 1 Cycle of ProLon (5 days)
  • Ships Once

Best for starting healthy habits
  • 1 Cycle of ProLon
  • Delivered Monthly
  • No Commitment, Pause or Cancel Anytime
  • Free Signature Water Bottle

Best for healthy maintenance
  • 3 Cycles of ProLon
  • Ships Once
  • Greatest Results based on our Clinical Trials
  • Free Signature Water Bottle
  • Free 10ct Fast Bar

settings.details: Everything you need for a 5-day nutritional intervention. Easy to follow boxes for each day with functional soups, snacks, energy bars, and teas. All the macro and micronutrients to fortify your 5 day journey.

settings.code:
5 DAYS TOWARDS HEALTH & LONGEVITY

Use this advanced section to build your own layouts or to add custom HTML or scripts.

settings.title: #1 Doctor Recommended
settings.text: ProLon is the #1 Doctor Recommend Fasting Nutrition Program, worldwide. Backed by the science & data that Doctors trust.

settings.title: 1,000,000+ Kits Sold
settings.text: Over one million kits sold around the world, and on a mission to reach over a million more! Sharing is caring and we care about health and longevity.

settings.title: Based on Nobel-Prize Science
settings.text: ProLon is inspired by Nobel Prize-winning science on Autophagy - the process of cellular rejuvenation.

settings.mdesc: I discovered ProLon last January and I have been doing it consistently ever since then. It is a really great reset for your body, especially after holidays. It has so many different benefits, it curbs sugar cravings and helps me manage portion control.
settings.author: -WHITNEY

settings.mdesc: I started ProLon and i'm telling you, it worked! I lost 6 pounds, I have no brain fog, I absolutely do not crave sugar right now which is insane and I actually feel amazing, I'm full of energy! I am so proud of myself, my husband did it with me, he lost 5 pounds, says he has never felt better.
settings.author: -CAROLINE

settings.mdesc:
How are you going to feel after 5 days... Amazing! No belly bloat, you are going to lose weight, have more energy, and all your cravings for sugar... GONE! You have to give this a try.
*Please Note - Water bottles are no longer included in each box.
settings.author: -AUDREY

settings.mtitle: Three of the reasons I love ProLon
settings.mdesc: ProLon resets my gut (especially when I’ve been traveling), it helps me sleep better, and it allows me to take a break. These are three of the reasons why I love ProLon. I’ve done it for over four years and I only talk about things that I love.
settings.author: -TINX

settings.code:
Precision fasting nutrition,
keeps your body in fasting state

Cellular Clean-up
ProLon supports the body’s natural process of cellular clean-up, triggered when it’s in a prolonged fasting state.


Fat Focused Weight Loss
ProLon has been tested to help people lose an average of 5.7 lbs, targeted at visceral fat, and 1.6 inches of waist circumference, while preserving lean body mass.*

*Benefits seen in a clinical study of the 5-day ProLon cycle once a month for three consecutive months.

settings.title: Tasty, safe and successful...!
settings.text:
“Excellent product! As a first-timer, I was concerned if I could do a 5-day cleanse. I experienced some hunger and tiredness but no headaches or crabbines. Everything was tasty. Lost 5 poinds and only gained 1 back.
Already purchased two additional kits.”

-Janet K.

settings.title: Endless Rewards...
settings.text:
"The rewards from this program are endless. Not only did I lose 8lbs in 5 days*, I also gained a ton of mental toughness from it. Knowing that I could stick to the program for 5 days hasgiven me the ability to not give in to my cravings and has aided me in contined weight loss."

-Vincent S.

*Results not typical.  Average weight loss is 5 pounds in 5 days.

settings.title: Excellent Customer Service...
settings.text:
"The beauty was that after 5 days, I was no longer hungry. no more hunger pains. I am on the 4th box in a row and am feeling fantastic. No desire to eat. easy to pass up treats, dinner, pastries. Very Amazing. I am hoping this will launch me on a more reasonable way of eating."

-Julie T.

settings.question: WHAT'S INSIDE THE BOX?
settings.answer:
What’s in the Kit
Soups

A variety of easy-to-prepare soups made with a proprietary mix of all-natural, plant-based ingredients

Supplements

Dietary supplement packed with multivitamins, amino-acids, minerals and omega-3 fatty acid to provide the body with nourishment

Nut Bars

Cold-pressed, delicious nut bars with whole ingredients like almonds, macadamia nuts, and pecans

L-Drink

Fruit-flavored, proprietary glycerol mix designed to fuel and protect muscles throughout the fast

Snacks

Snacks such as olives from the South of Spain where olive consumption is associated with longevity, and kale crackers enriched with plant-based protein.

TEAS

Caffeine-free herbal teas loaded with healthy antioxidants.

Nutrition Facts

settings.title: Meet Some Of Our Loyal ProLoners
settings.text: ProLon® was founded on the passion for figuring out the secrets of healthy longevity. It is our purpose to share the benefits you can achieve through the ProLon Fasting Mimicking Diet. Hear from some of our most loyal ProLoners.

settings.title: What if you could get many of the benefits of a 5-day fast – and eat at the same time?
settings.text:
With the ProLon fasting-mimicking technology, you can. This 5-day fasting nutrition program tricks your body into believing it’s in a fasting state. And you get to eat real food.

Everything you need for a successful 5-day fast. It’s simple — a box for each day with packaged soup mixes, snacks, energy bars and drinks. All the macro and micronutrients to fortify your fast. Just 5 days will change your relationship with food.
